name: Bafi Finance
description: BAFI FINANCE is a binance smart chain project aim to revolutionise the IDO Launchpad, Swap, farming and gaming platform with unique features. BAFI Finance is a decentralized exchange built on binance smart chain, with a lots of other features that let you swap tokens, play game, conduct IDO, provide liquidity, stake and earn tokens, bridge cross-chain tokens, NFT and yield farming pools.
